channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Black Friday audio : les écouteurs sans fil, casques, barres de son et enceintes montent le volume et baissent leur prix dans ce top des offres
item.description: Apple AirPods, JBL Charge, Marshall, Nothing, Bowers & Wilkins... Les grandes marques de l'audio bradent leurs écouteurs, casques, enceintes, barres de son et autres pendant l'avant-première du Black Friday. Voici notre sélection des meilleures offres !

item.title: Amazon ne fait pas l’impasse sur le pré-Black Friday : voici les 17 offres à saisir
item.description: Amazon propose déjà ses premières offres avant le Black Friday et n’hésite pas à casser les prix de nombreuses références Tech sur son site. Il y aura forcément de quoi vous faire plaisir, retrouvez les offres qui valent le coup.

item.title: The Boox Palma 2 e-book reader is now $84 off
item.description: As somebody who can get distracted by social networking and videos really easily, I love the idea of e-book readers — they let me concentrate on a book without the temptation to switch to TikTok. That’s why I find Onyx’s Boox Palma 2 so attractive. It’s about the same size as a smartphone, it’s eminently […]

item.title: CarPlay pourrait finalement arriver dans les Tesla !
item.description: Allons bon, on pensait que ça n'arriverait jamais : Tesla développerait finalement le support de CarPlay dans ses véhicules !

item.title: CISA warns federal agencies to patch flawed Cisco firewalls amid ‘active exploitation’ across the US government
item.description: The federal cybersecurity agency said some government departments had been actively exploited after failing to properly patch their systems.

item.title: Focal Azurys : cet élégant casque Hi-Fi made in France réduit son prix de 200 € pour le pré-Black Friday
item.description: Un casque hi-fi fermé, fabriqué en France, qui mêle savoir-faire artisanal et transducteurs maison, c’est l’Azurys : une élégance signée Focal. Et pour ce pré-Black Friday, il se permet une coupe dans son tarif, passant de 549 euros à 349 euros sur Son-Vidéo.com.

item.title: TikTok launches its own version of Instagram’s broadcast channels
item.description: TikTok is rolling out “bulletin board,” a new one-to-many messaging feature that mirrors Instagram’s broadcast channels. The tool lets creators and brands share text, images, and videos directly with followers.

item.title: Firefighters received chemical burns at Elon Musk’s Boring Company construction site
item.description: The firefighters had to be treated at a hospital and received permanent scars, according to a report from Fortune. But the Boring Company was not fined after it met with state officials.

item.title: How to watch Cheltenham November Meeting 2025 for *FREE* — Watch Jonbon's return live on ITVX
item.description: Here's our guide on how to watch all of this weekend's Cheltenham action beginning with the return of Jonbon live on ITVX from anywhere in the world.

item.title: Uber is making it easier to get a ride at the airport or pay for someone else’s
item.description: A few new features are coming to the Uber app, including one that could make it simpler to pick someone up or cover their ride. The new “Send a Ride” feature allows you to pay for someone else’s Uber ride directly from the app. You set the number of rides and spending limit, then send […]

item.title: Google takes on Pinterest with a dedicated ‘inspirational’ images tab in its mobile app
item.description: The company is adding an "Images" icon at the bottom of Google's Search app for iOS and Android devices that will display images personalized to the user's interests.

item.title: Tesla Powerwall 2 recall expands to US after reports of fires
item.description: The U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission has received 22 reports of overheating, smoking, or burning Tesla Powerwall 2 home batteries. The company will replace defective units.

item.title: Quel sera le prix de la Steam Machine ? Nos prédictions
item.description: Valve a dévoilé sa console de jeu de salon Steam Machine, mais n'a pas annoncé son prix de vente. Voici ce à quoi on peut s'attendre.

item.title: Google’s SIMA 2 agent uses Gemini to reason and act in virtual worlds
item.description: “SIMA 2 is a more general agent. It can complete complex tasks in previously unseen environments. And it's a self-improving agent... which is a step toward more genera- purpose robots and AGI systems more generally.”

item.title: TCL just launched an unbelievably cheap gaming QLED TV, with 144Hz support, plus both Dolby Vision and HDR10+
item.description: TCL's new gaming QLED TV starts at just $599.

item.title: Le succès des vidéos rejouant l’Histoire grâce à l’IA
item.description: Des touristes observant la reine Marie-Antoinette avant son exécution, un soldat américain se filmant lors du Débarquement de 1944 en France : des vidéos de grands évènements historiques générées par intelligence artificielle (IA) remportent un franc succès sur les réseaux sociaux, alimentant les craintes d’une approche faussée de l’Histoire.

item.title: Google sues Chinese hacker group which allegedly stole $1 billion from a million victims
item.description: The Lighthouse Enterprise is a major phishing-as-a-service operation from China used to build thousands of fake sites.

item.title: LinkedIn is making it easier to search for people with AI
item.description: LinkedIn is launching an AI-powered search feature that allows you to find people by describing who you’re looking for. Now, instead of searching for an exact name, job title, or company, you can enter a more descriptive search, such as “Northwestern alumni who work in entertainment marketing,” or even pose a question, like “Who can […]

item.title: LinkedIn adds AI-powered search to help users find people
item.description: LinkedIn's AI-powered people search is rolling out to premium users in the U.S.

item.title: Inside LinkedIn’s generative AI cookbook: How it scaled people search to 1.3 billion users
item.description: LinkedIn is launching its new AI-powered people search this week, after what seems like a very long wait for what should have been a natural offering for generative AI.It comes a full three years after the launch of ChatGPT and six months after LinkedIn launched its AI job search offering. For technical leaders, this timeline illustrates a key enterprise lesson: Deploying generative AI in real enterprise settings is challenging, especially at a scale of 1.3 billion users. It’s a slow, brutal process of pragmatic optimization.The following account is based on several exclusive interviews with t...

item.title: LinkedIn’s new AI people search unlocks the power of its network
item.description: The world’s greatest business expertise still resides in the brains of individual humans. This feature is about making it easier to find them. Last June, LinkedIn CEO Ryan Roslansky took on a second job. Microsoft, the social network for business professionals’ owner since 2016, expanded his responsibilities to include Microsoft 365—the suite still better known by its former name, Microsoft Office—and its Copilot AI assistant. The role charges him with making AI useful in a productivity context, a goal that’s still very much a work in progress.But Roslansky also remains in charge of LinkedIn, ...

item.description: Les discussions de groupe sur Google Messages vont bientôt gagner en clarté : Google commence à tester la mention @ dans les conversations RCS. De quoi transformer un dialogue brouillon en espace où l’on peut enfin interpeller directement ses amis.

item.title: Black Friday PC portable : La sélection des 11 meilleures offres sur les laptops bureautiques et gaming d’Apple, MSI, Lenovo…

item.title: Gambling online? Watch out for these risks, say public health experts
item.description: Gambling online is more accessible than ever. Online betting is more accessible than ever, with 14% of U.S. adults saying they bet on professional or college sports online either frequently or occasionally, according to a February poll by The Associated Press-NORC Center for Public Affairs Research. It’s also in the news, with a growing list of sports betting scandals making headlines.Public health advocates and personal finance advisers say it’s important to know the risks if you’re going to gamble online.“Gambling and ‘responsibly’ seem to be oxymoronic, because if you’re gambling it’s all ...

item.title: TikTok attaqué en France pour diffusions d’extraits de films et de séries non autorisées
item.description: Le réseau social préféré des Jeunes est attaqué par la SACD, l'organisme chargé de défendre les droits des auteurs d'œuvres (films, séries, dessins animés, spectacles ...) qui relèvent de son répertoire.

item.title: Should we really blame billionaires for our own financial struggles? In fact, more Americans say yes
item.description: People increasingly see extreme wealth as contributing to an unfair society, and that sentiment is especially high with Gen Z and millennials. Americans have long ogled the rich, but the country’s widening wealth gap—and the billionaires fueling it—have been facing growing scrutiny.

item.title: Ce robot tondeuse premium de chez Dreame est presque à moitié prix lors du pré-Black-Friday (-44 %)
item.description: Grâce à une navigation laser, une appli bien pensée et une intelligence embarquée qui s’améliore avec le temps, le Dreame A1 Pro taille votre jardin comme un pro… pendant que vous faites autre chose. Pour le pré-Black Friday sur Amazon, on le trouve à 899 euros au lieu de 1 599 euros.

It also […]

item.title: Combien coûtera la Steam Machine ?
item.description: La grande inconnue de la nouvelle console de salon dévoilée par Steam hier, c'est celle du prix. Le constructeur n'a pas voulu donner de tarif pour la Steam Machine. Et au vu des composants « custom » de l'appareil, il est bien difficile de tracer des parallèles avec le monde PC. Néanmoins, on peut toujours essayer de définir une fourchette à la louche....

item.title: Michelle Obama’s new book ‘The Look’ explores her iconic fashion choices as First Lady
item.description: Her newest book, ‘The Look,’ was written with her longtime stylist Meredith Koop. On any day during her eight years as First Lady of the United States, Michelle Obama said she could go from giving a speech to meeting with a counterpart from another country to digging in her vegetable garden with groups of schoolchildren.And her clothes had to be ready for that. There was too much else to do, including raising daughters Sasha and Malia, and she said she didn’t have time to obsess over what she was wearing.“I was concerned about, ‘Can I hug somebody in it? Will it get dirty?'” she said Wednesday...

item.title: 3 virus, 1 000 serveurs, des millions d’identifiants volés : la police pulvérise l’arsenal des cybercriminels
item.description: Les autorités viennent de démanteler trois nouveaux malwares. Coordonnée par Europol, une opération d'envergure, découlant de l'initiative Endgame, a permis de neutraliser un trio de virus, dont un voleur de données et un botnet. Plus de 1 000 serveurs malveillants ont été démantelés et des centaines de milliers d’ordinateurs ont été libérés des griffes des pirates....

item.title: The company at the heart of the AI bubble
item.description: So a lot of people think AI is a bubble.
